thread.title: Re: Say CHEESE! LA Times photo of the Oscars audience taken at THAT moment is HILARIOUS
thread.title_full: Re: Say CHEESE! LA Times photo of the Oscars audience taken at THAT moment is HILARIOUS

author: socalcon
title: Re: Say CHEESE! LA Times photo of the Oscars audience taken at THAT moment is HILARIOUS
text:
Say CHEESE! LA Times photo of Oscars audience taken at THAT moment is HILARIOUS Posted at 10:58 am on February 27, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Oh Hollywood. You do entertain us and not always on purpose. 
The look on Meryl Streep’s face alone is worth every moment of that boring, sanctimonious, self-centered hot mess called the Oscars. 
Guess what had just happened onstage when they snapped this photo: Watch the moment when "La La Land" is mistakenly announced best picture winner https://t.co/h3WScQsfxB pic.twitter.com/5QzqnwfwRv 
— Los Angeles Times (@latimes) February 27, 2017 
OH YEAH, that’s it. They had awarded the Best Picture Oscar to the WRONG MOVIE. 
And this wasn’t just some editing Oscar or for visual effects, this was the BIG ONE. 
Hence also the look on Matt Damon’s and the Rock’s face. We know how you feel, Rock. pic.twitter.com/vriy105eeI
